text: Takheun Hadharat cit ek Neubalah Keu bandum gata ek Neubri azeub Di ateuh di yup azeub that leupah 7 Atawa gata meukawom-kawom Neubri nyang ladom meupicah-picah Hana sapeue kheun lam kawan gata Nyang ladom teuga droe jipeuleumah Jielanya treuk nyang tan kuasa Le ureueng teuga lawan meunyerah Takalon pakri meupeudeuh ayat Mangat jih meuhat meuphom sileupah
